statements: SELECT * FROM user_subscriptions;
SELECT user_id, payment_amount, start_date FROM user_subscriptions;
SELECT end_date, payment_amount FROM user_subscriptions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_subscriptions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT subscription_id, start_date, payment_amount FROM user_subscriptions WHERE payment_amount > 50;
SELECT * FROM user_subscriptions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, payment_amount FROM user_subscriptions WHERE payment_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_users FROM user_subscriptions;
SELECT AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment, MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment, MIN(payment_amount) AS min_payment FROM user_subscriptions;
SELECT user_id, subscription_id, start_date, end_date FROM user_subscriptions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM user_subscriptions;
SELECT user_id, start_date, end_date, subscription_id FROM user_subscriptions ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, start_date, end_date, subscription_id FROM user_subscriptions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, subscription_id, start_date FROM user_subscriptions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT user_id, subscription_id, start_date, end_date FROM user_subscriptions JOIN recurring_payments ON user_subscriptions.user_id = recurring_payments.user_id WHERE recurring_payments.amount > 50;
SELECT * FROM user_subscriptions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, start_date, end_date FROM user_subscriptions WHERE subscription_id = 2 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, subscription_id, SUM(amount) as total_amount FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY user_id, subscription_id;
SELECT user_id, subscription_id, payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount >= 50 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;

SELECT * FROM user_subscriptions INNER JOIN recurring_payments ON user_subscriptions.user_id = recurring_payments.user_id AND user_subscriptions.subscription_id = recurring_payments.subscription_id ORDER BY user_subscriptions.start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscription
SELECT user_id, subscription_id, start_date FROM subscription WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT subscription_id, end_date, user_id FROM subscription ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT payment_id, amount, user_id, payment_date FROM payment WHERE amount > 100
SELECT service_id, service_name, price FROM service ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT user_id, start_date, end_date FROM subscription WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT service_name, price FROM service ORDER BY service_name ASC
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount FROM payment WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT user_id, subscription_id, end_date FROM subscription WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' AND user_id = 2 ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT user_id, subscription_id, start_date, end_date FROM subscription JOIN payment ON subscription.user_id = payment.user_id WHERE payment.amount >= 50 ORDER BY subscription.start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE subscription_status = 'active';
SELECT subscription_id, user_id, subscription_type FROM subscriptions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, user_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM services WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(service_description) > 20;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE subscription_status = 'active'
SELECT subscription_id, subscription_type, user_id FROM subscriptions ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT username, payment_amount, payment_date FROM users INNER JOIN payments ON users.user_id = payments.user_id
SELECT service_id, service_name, service_description FROM services WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(service_description) > 50
SELECT * FROM user_account;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_account ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_subscription WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, price FROM subscription_plan WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT payment_id, user_id, amount, payment_date FROM payment WHERE payment_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM user_account WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_account WHERE subscription_end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, plan_name, price FROM user_subscription JOIN subscription_plan ON user_subscription.plan_id = subscription_plan.plan_id;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payment WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, status, description, transaction_date FROM payment_history WHERE status = 'Success' AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
